Text: Just changed my settings, seeding a lot better now. First upload so bear with me. :P

First, I'd like to thank you all for seeding and hope that you'll continue to do so!

Second, the Laputa that I included contains the old 80s ENG dub (which is awful) and Japanese dub, where both have a pretty dated soundtrack.

I've uploaded another torrent with the much improved soundtrack and English dub with some other great Ghibli films, an improved copy of Porco Rosso as well as Miyazaki's Lupin 3rd Movie.

Please visit Part 2 of the Miyazaki Collection here: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8476190/Miyazaki_Collection_2_Ghibli_DVD_IMAGE_Multi-Lang_ENG_JAP_Subs_E

Also, the program used to convert these files is called ConvertXtoDVD

Thanks!
